entries.do_not_edit: The English version of this file (corellia_38_teilo_monnro.stf) is automatically generated by the SwgConversationEditor.
entries.s_43: That Meatlump Hrath Koo has bothered me for the last time! He comes into my shop and destroys whatever I'm working on. But no more! Because I'm going to pay you to go into that cave and stop him.
entries.s_47: Oh. Well, did you happen to see anyone else who might be willing to go in and teach him a lesson? I guess I'll wait here and hope someone else shows up.
entries.s_48: I knew you could do it. Now I'm finally free from Hrath's menace. Such a relief, I cannot tell you.
entries.s_49: In the cave, you'll find a Meatlump named Hrath Koo. Teach him to leave people alone and not to destroy their property.
